name: Sector V1 ( work in progress )
description:
Sector is a platformer game, ( still in development ).

The demo contains a small section of the game, to give the players an examlpe of how the shooting will play and certain AI enemies will react to the player.

Gameplay Keys and Instructions:

- ENTER - Show main menu
- ARROW KEYS - Move Player
  Double tap arrow left or right to run
  Double tap arrow down to jump down a platform

SPACE - Hostler gun in or out
LEFT CTRL - Shoot
LEFT SHIFT - Roll dodge
E - Interact with switches and elevators

P - Show player debug info
O - Show enemie debug info
